87.wms: Virus Korona singino luk ewe nombono buku-buku talokga detbo:

88.wms:
Kitanggutlo takbukman: Buku komik nombone yayun kitanggutla asinggup hiwagilokgup wambemomopsigindik. Gupwe yayune tembetik, nombono lukge alipkup satkup lapkitmatkegegle, yayun kitanggut talokge wambemomat.  
Referensi: Komik nombephalono COVID-19 sigino luk ewe yanggumalembone kogeno 28 Februari 2020 getbono buku tagemgup tulepon talok epka lapetik oplawo ugumalembo.

Informasi kitanggut: Komik nombone PDFka okmalembone nombephalo lawomoge: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Komik lawomowo yandit: Nombono Komikge gupwe wasi lawomat. Whatsapp kanggoyo Face Book talokga lapelo, ap talokgup, sekola talokgup, keleman talokgupka hetago kinggopmomopsigindik.
Komik nombone dagatmomalo topwe tagemgupwo luk nombe hetago katkenak:
1. Komik top nombono bagetle laphamoget.
2. Komik nombone halonano tagetka takbikmomop sigindikdoe.
3. FB talokga dagatmomopkegele, nombono hitkup oknu: @weimankowart (IG), koyo link nombone hanot: instagram.com/weimankow

91.eng: Inggriso lukga okmatbono kapko hitle Paul Frank (www.sil-lead.org), Indonesiano lukga okmatbono kapko hitle Nazra Luftiana (Unicef Indonesia), Bisip kitanggutlo lukga okmalembone: www.suluh.org

92.eng: Ne oplawo okmalembono lukge laphamoget, do luk kitanggutka hetago katkemomopsigi oplawo oknuntak, epkup komik nombone taget lawomopsigindik dagatmoget.  Luk kitanggutka oplawo ugumomalo topwe nombono lukgup bagetkup okmatbono kap Weiman Kow ego hitle oknuntak.

Inggriso lukga okmatbono kapko hitle Paul Frank (www.sil-lead.org), Indonesiano lukga okmatbono kapko hitle Nazra Luftiana (Unicef Indonesia), Bisip kitanggutlo lukga okmalembone: www.suluh.org
Ne oplawo okmalembono lukge laphamoget, do luk kitanggutka hetago katkemomopsigi oplawo oknuntak, epkup komik nombone taget lawomopsigindik dagatmoget.  Luk kitanggutka oplawo ugumomalo topwe nombono lukgup bagetkup okmatbono kap Weiman Kow ego hitle oknuntak.

Sobre el Coronavirus
bookText.wms:
STOP VIRUS KORONA

Tim Penerjemah Bahasa Wambon

VIRUS KORONAne andagamondik komegegen eptage sanggomo katkenaktak

etomat
Bonopka
Kalitka
Kelopka
Hinbalino kap
Yayuno kap

Walokge matomalo topka Viruse moto komegemat

Wambemo kamgenakna. Kamge 2 metetkenaknandik, walokge demale gogopwe domandage matetkenamat.
1
2m
     Ahi !!!
Golo kapwe apyokgup, hiwagilokgup, yayunggupka hetkonamale nemanunantak:

Egeptaga masketle nandakna. Emanunano egepwe hiwagilokdik goyo apyokdik ewe masket topka si halono sinimo manggopwe lawontakdoe.
2


Nombono kapwe epmo yayune bumdik, do ego andit wambemomopsigi masket halogen.
Viruskola lawatbono kapwe tepwe lapbesanmono katkenagetoendik, ego yayune kamo komegemoge.
Langkap dagit talokge awopdik yayunggup dimopwe gogopwe amokgolo, matetbaline kap dagit talokge kanaget.
Bilin sendok
Hinbalino kap
Mobil talokgo  geleman
Tombot
Tisu
Okdim
Elektolonik ambat
Masket mote besan nemet talok
Halik talok lapdiman
Mous
Bolpen
Aptop geleman
Ego bisit
Emandik, yayuno kapko walokge nombombo talokga ambomoge…
Gogopwe viruskola lawono yayunmonamat.
koyo gup sinimo manggopko kelopkalit lawatkegele,
koyo kelopwe lawo hopkotmat,

Manggopdoeka imakeman ewe baunbelo dako ga kelopkalitle lawat,
Matetbaline ewo imakeman ambatle sabungga goyo baikilin okga ogopnundik goyo, alkohol okga geleman talokge hopkotnundik viruse tembetkemat.
Viruse imakeman ambat talokga bageno satkelopwe 24kupke motomgemoge.

Nombemanyepmo viruse halongganuntak.
Ewoptagolo, nombono lukge hetago lapkitmane matet kayan.
Sabungga ogokmonagano nombephalogen.

Bisit munggup
Ga kelopkalitle laphetkoget.
(Awopko kelopkalitkup laphetkoget.)
Kelat topwo na walip kolamo nege.”
Tutnum topwo na walip kolamo nege,

Nombono bemsekge lio nanggatka ga bisitle ogoknu!
        “Ou…,
Tutnum topwo kuwup-kowaop nege, Kelat topwo kuwup-kowaop nege.
Bisit talon kakmontopkup
Ogoknuno kogeno 20 detik gentak
Bisit muktopkup ogoknuntak.
Bisit atat mimbanggup
Ga bisitle andagambetik ogokmono bokge tembetkemat?

Lawatkegele, wasi sabungga bisit ogoknu.
Masket mote besan talokge ga bisitka lawoget.

Masketle ugumgegeno motomgetkegele viruse ephalo bage komegemat.
Ga masketle bokgupkegele sanun ka.
Masketle ugumgeno satle dominuk laphaloget.
Sendokge egepkup-egepkup
Amit
Bap
Nayop
Handokge egepkup-egepkup
Andemopkup,bilin sendokgup, okdimgup, handokgupwe ketopdak-ketopdakmonaget.
Bisit munggupkane ga kelopkalitle lawogetoe, golo ka emanuna.
Lapkitmomatkegele, aptopwe bisit munggupka goyo manlingga bakbet katombetnu.

Ap etomalo topka
Andemop enogeno topka
Ga bisitle alipkup satkup sabungga ogopnu.
Batgotop,

WAMBEMBETIK HINBALINGGA NAMBO!

Kitanggutlo lukge tulepon halongga hetago katkenak.
"This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Bussiness Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
"The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)
"How to Avoid the Corona Virus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)

Referensi: Komik nombephalono COVID-19 sigino luk ewe yanggumalembone kogeno 28 Februari 2020 getbono buku tagemgup tulepon talok epka lapetik oplawo ugumalembo.
